title: Cursor Rules vs Claude Skills
content: 视频资源三周深度实测：Claude Skills 真的强到离谱，它不是 Prompt 收藏夹！ | 回到 Axton 文章资源别再只写 CLAUDE.md 了：用 Rules 重构 Claude Code 的记忆系统 其他资源https://github.com/PatrickJS/awesome-cursorrules https://github.com/ComposioHQ/awesome-claude-skills

title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new My New Post More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
